selected_quotes: There is now science-based way to deliver a successful apology
Studies suggest that the most effective apologies have specific features
Need to apologise? Science is here to tell you how best to do it.
An apology should be intense, empathic and timely
Need to say sorry? Read this first! By Dr Richard Stephens, Senior Lecturer

citation.abstract: An apology carried out the right way can be far more efficient than you'd imagine.
